From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Saturday, April 10, 2010=
 2:57 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
Who: L=
ord Elder
Location: The Ark - Command center

Lord Elder stalked through th=
e halls of the Ark, which is what he did
when he needed to think. There was=
 something going on here and he
needed to get to the bottom of it before it=
 was too late.

He was on his way back to the command center when a call ca=
me in to him . . .

> "Lord Elder, we're here, but we dunno what's go'n dow=
n with Tucson Prime. Cyclonus asked 'em a question and I thought for sure h=
e was gonna go after him with a vengeance. But he didn't. He's right here, =
in some sorta trance like state. Hope those creepoids didn't get inside his=
 directory. Quickstride, how is he?"
>
> Quickstride shrugs.
>
> " Nothn' y=
et Rat Trap, he's in deep thought. Sir, we dunno what ta make of this, we n=
ever saw anything like this before. Got any idea what's going on?"
>
> They=
 look to the video com link device on Rat Trap's arm as they wait for an an=
swer.

Elder looked at Rat Trap and Quickstride through the comlink, taking=
 a
moment to comprehend just what he was hearing. Finally he shook his
head=
, "I doubt that he has been taken over."

Elder shrugged slightly, feeling =
every bit uneasy about events, and
very much out of his depth, "There are v=
ery few who could take over a
Prime." he said confidently, although he coul=
d think of a few, one of
the insecticons for one. He was certainly glad tho=
se guys weren't
around.

"If you guys are where I think you are, then you n=
eed to get Tuscon
out of there. You guys are an easy target with Tuscon fro=
zen like
that. How come you guys didn't just storm the fortress . . . "

El=
der peered into the scene behind Rat Trap and Quickstride, "Ahhhh,
Hydras h=
as sank he base."

Elder thought for a moment, "Legacy and I had been exper=
imenting with
explosive depth charges to counter that." Elder rubbed his ch=
in
thoughtfully, "If you can create a breach in Hydras' walls from the
outs=
ide while it is submerged, I don't think even he would like all
that hot ma=
gma running into his base."

Elder shrugged, "We never got a chance to test=
 it, and we weren't sure
if it would work anyways." He glanced over at Tusc=
on through Rat
Trap's video feed, sadness on his face, "It's too bad you do=
n't have
any explosive charges with you . . . "

(TAG)

Preston
